translation.en: Vision, normal.
translation.ja: 視覚　正常

translation.en: Hearing, normal.
translation.ja: 聴覚　正常

translation.en: Smell…
translation.ja: 嗅覚…

translation.en: …normal.
translation.ja: 正常

translation.en: Pain perception, normal.
translation.ja: 痛覚… 正常

translation.en: Blood glucose, electrolytes, enzymes, all abnormally normal.
translation.ja: ブドウ糖 電解質 酵素 血中濃度　異常なし

translation.en: Just what you'd expect from a brand- new body.
translation.ja: すべて完璧な新しい体

translation.en: Emotional responses and stress tolerance, normal.
translation.ja: 感情 ストレス耐性 共に正常

translation.en: Memories, clear.
translation.ja: 記憶　正常

translation.en: I am human.
translation.ja: 私は人間だ

translation.en: Morning, Nina.
translation.ja: おはよう ニーナ

translation.en: Hi, Mack. Would you please come to the medical room?
translation.ja: マック 医務室へ来てくれる？

translation.en: For the physical?
translation.ja: 検査か？

translation.en: Just give me a moment to take all this in.
translation.ja: もう少し待って

translation.en: I was just born into this world, you know.
translation.ja: 生まれたばかりなんだ

translation.en: The printing is accurate, right down to the patterns in the iris.
translation.ja: 虹彩のパターンまで 正確に印刷されてる

translation.en: Even twins don't match that well.
translation.ja: 双子でも一致しないのに

translation.en: Mmm. My taste buds seem to be working fine too.
translation.ja: 味覚も機能してる

translation.en: Although this stuff may not look all that appetizing, it's not bad.
translation.ja: 見た目は悪いが味は悪くない

translation.en: When I eat it, I can tell that it tastes good.
translation.ja: 私も おいしいと感じた

translation.en: We're instinctively comparing it to food we ate in the past.
translation.ja: 無意識に 昔の食事と比較してしまう

translation.en: What about your memories? How's the connection?
translation.ja: 記憶はどう？　覚えてる？

translation.en: When I was getting backed up, I lay down on the bed and closed my eyes.
translation.ja: 記憶を保存する時 ベッドに横になり⸺

translation.en: And then when I opened them again, I was on the other side of space.
translation.ja: 目を閉じて 再び開いたら この船にいた

translation.en: It's kind of a shock.
translation.ja: とても驚いたわ

translation.en: Same here.
translation.ja: 僕もだよ

translation.en: I have the illusion of my consciousness just continuing right from that day.
translation.ja: 記憶を保存した日から 意識が続いてるような感じ

translation.en: But the physical person I am now, it's-- It's not the person who got their memory backed up.
translation.ja: でも今の僕と その時の僕は 別人なんだよね

translation.en: Oscar's finished printing.
translation.ja: オスカーだわ

translation.en: Amazing.
translation.ja: すばらしい

translation.en: The cavity's gone. This new body's fantastic.
translation.ja: 新しい体には虫歯がないぞ

translation.en: Yes!
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: Hey, I think it's about time we got to work.
translation.ja: そろそろ任務に就かないと

translation.en: We can, after everybody's printed.
translation.ja: 全員が印刷されたらな

translation.en: We need to get going before the migrant vessel gets here.
translation.ja: 移民船が到着してしまう

translation.en: Bullshit. The migrants won't arrive for another hundred years.
translation.ja: バカ野郎 そんなの100年後の話だ

translation.en: Living beings can't make it through subspace, even in cryosleep. They can't warp here.
translation.ja: 冷凍睡眠状態でも 生物はワープできない

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.ja: クソッ

translation.en: - Hello, Patty. - Hey, Patty.
translation.ja: パティ やあ パティ

translation.en: Good morning, everyone.
translation.ja: おはよう

translation.en: While we're waiting for Lewis, let's talk.
translation.ja: ルイスが起きるのを待とう

translation.en: We're almost at our destination of Planet X- 10. We've already entered its star system.
translation.ja: 僕たちは現在 惑星X-10の 惑星系内にいる

translation.en: How many days has it been since we left Earth?
translation.ja: 地球を発(た)って どのくらい？

translation.en: It's been what, a week?
translation.ja: １週間くらいか？

translation.en: But of course, that's in days based on the rotation of the Earth.
translation.ja: 地球時で換算するとだがな

translation.en: So where are our original selves now?
translation.ja: 私たちのオリジナルは どこ？

translation.en: We can't track them in real time. But if we were to make a rough estimate…
translation.ja: 正確には分からないが ざっくりなら…

translation.en: the migrant vessel should be around here.
translation.ja: 移民船は この辺りにいるはず

translation.en: It's a long trip, so everyone's in cryosleep to keep from aging.
translation.ja: 老化を防ぐため 冷凍睡眠に入ってる

translation.en: Our original selves are dreaming away.
translation.ja: 今頃 夢を見てるだろう

translation.en: It must be strange for them too.
translation.ja: 眠っている間に⸺

translation.en: Another version of their self has been created on the other side of space and is working while they're asleep.
translation.ja: 別の自分が動いてるなんて 何だか変な感じだわ

translation.en: We were chosen and given special permission to be printed by The Womb.
translation.ja: 私たちは選ばれ ウームによって印刷された

translation.en: It's an honor.
translation.ja: 光栄だわ

translation.en: We were selected because we were the most qualified.
translation.ja: 適性があると判断された

translation.en: So we have to make Planet X- 10 a comfortable place to live before they arrive.
translation.ja: 人類のため 惑星の開発任務に従事しよう

translation.en: - - What's happening?
translation.ja: どうした？

translation.en: Shit! It's an electromagnetic wave. And it's damn strong.
translation.ja: マズい　電磁波だ かなり強い

translation.en: It can't be.
translation.ja: そんなはず…

translation.en: It's a flare.
translation.ja: 太陽フレア

translation.en: Had me going for a second.
translation.ja: 少し焦ったぜ

translation.en: No reports of fire.
translation.ja: 現在 出火はなし

translation.en: But there are some areas I can't confirm. Looks like some of the electronic equipment isn't responding.
translation.ja: でも 機械が反応しなくて 確認できないエリアがある

translation.en: All right, let's split up and inspect for damage.
translation.ja: 手分けして状態を確認しよう

translation.en: - Got it? - Got it.
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: Good it didn't happen while you were out there. Could have been exposed to radiation.
translation.ja: 外で作業をしてたら 被ばくしてたわね

translation.en: Luck was on my side.
translation.ja: 危なかった

translation.en: I want to know why nobody told us that this sun sneezes.
translation.ja: 太陽がくしゃみをするなんて

translation.en: Yeah, that was a little too close for comfort, if you ask me.
translation.ja: 太陽が近いと こんな弊害もあるのね

translation.en: It's just a little bit of bad luck.
translation.ja: 運が悪かったな

translation.en: Wow. It's huge.
translation.ja: すごい…

translation.en: What is it, Mack?
translation.ja: 何が？

translation.en: The atmospheric transformer.
translation.ja: 大気変換炉さ

translation.en: It'd better be big. That thing is gonna give the entire planet a makeover.
translation.ja: 惑星の大気を 丸ごと変えちまうんだ

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: そうだな

translation.en: Technically, the plants will do most of the work.
translation.ja: 植物で 居住環境を整える前に⸺

translation.en: But we need the reactor to stabilize the atmosphere first.
translation.ja: 変換炉で 大気を安定させないと

translation.en: Can anyone tell what's going on with the printing room?
translation.ja: 印刷室に異常はない？

translation.en: The Womb should've finished printing Lewis by now, but he hasn't come out.
translation.ja: 印刷が終わってるはずなのに ルイスが出てこない

translation.en: Hold on. The Womb is currently in operation.
translation.ja: ルイスは まだ印刷中だ

translation.en: That's odd.
translation.ja: 変だな

translation.en: There's an error message.
translation.ja: エラーメッセージだ

translation.en: I'd like to take a look inside, but entry during printing is a violation of privacy.
translation.ja: 印刷中に立ち入ると プライバシーの侵害になる

translation.en: Is everyone okay with me going in?
translation.ja: でも中の様子を見たい

translation.en: - Of course. - Permission granted.
translation.ja: 行け 許可するよ

translation.en: I agree as well.
translation.ja: 私もよ

translation.en: What is this?
translation.ja: これは一体…

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.ja: どうした？

translation.en: - It's Lewis, he… - Nina?
translation.ja: ルイスが… ニーナ？

translation.en: Get over here! Come quickly!
translation.ja: すぐに印刷室に来て

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.ja: そんな…

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Feeling better?
translation.ja: 落ち着いた？

translation.en: I guess so.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: The DNA analysis shows this is definitely Lewis.
translation.ja: ＤＮＡはルイスと一致してる

translation.en: But it is clearly not. Just look at him.
translation.ja: だが あの姿は ルイスじゃないよ

translation.en: There has to have been an error during the printing.
translation.ja: 印刷中 エラーを検出した

translation.en: It must have been from the flare.
translation.ja: 太陽フレアが⸺

translation.en: Maybe it caused a surge in The Womb that led to a malfunction.
translation.ja: ウームの電圧に 影響したせいかも

translation.en: So, is he alive?
translation.ja: 生きてるのか？

translation.en: The heart is beating.
translation.ja: 心臓は動いてる

translation.en: Any brain activity?
translation.ja: 脳のほうは？

translation.en: Yes, but only weak activity.
translation.ja: 弱いけど活動してる

translation.en: It's a state known as an alpha coma.
translation.ja: アルファ昏睡(こんすい)の状態よ

translation.en: Have there been other cases of The Womb failing during a printing?
translation.ja: 過去に印刷中の事故は？

translation.en: None that have been made public. There may have been during the development phase.
translation.ja: 聞いたことないけど 開発中に起きた可能性はある

translation.en: Remember, it wasn't made by human hands.
translation.ja: ウームには 人間が介入できない

translation.en: When dealing with printing errors, those who are at the scene decide what course of action to take, correct?
translation.ja: 印刷エラーに関する判断は 現場にいるクルーが下す

translation.en: Yes, that's right.
translation.ja: そのとおり

translation.en: We should reprint a proper Lewis. It's for the good of the mission.
translation.ja: 任務のためにも このルイスは廃棄して

translation.en: We should dispose of this one.
translation.ja: 再印刷しよう

translation.en: But that would be murder, wouldn't it?
translation.ja: それは殺人に当たるわ

translation.en: Do we have the right to take his life just because he lacks consciousness?
translation.ja: 意識がないことは 命を奪う理由にならない

translation.en: He's still a living being.
translation.ja: まだ生きてるもの

translation.en: Patty, we need material that contains Lewis's genetic information in order to reprint him.
translation.ja: 再印刷するには 彼の体から 遺伝子を採取しないと

translation.en: The quickest way to do that is to disassemble this one and use it as biomaterial.
translation.ja: 体を分解して 遺伝子を 使うのが一番手っ取り早い

translation.en: And it can't be from just anyone. To create Lewis, we need Lewis's biomaterial.
translation.ja: 彼自身の生体材料じゃないと ルイスは作れない

translation.en: We can make more by cultivating. The bodies that we have now were made
translation.ja: 培養すればいいのよ この体もオリジナルから 採取した細胞で作られてる

translation.en: by growing material from harvested cells, right?
translation.ja: この体もオリジナルから 採取した細胞で作られてる

translation.en: I did go ahead and start the cell cultivation, just in case.
translation.ja: もしものために 細胞を培養し始めた

translation.en: But it's going to take a while.
translation.ja: でも時間がかかる

translation.en: If we wait, our schedule will be delayed.
translation.ja: 予定に間に合わない

translation.en: Lewis is responsible for the atmospheric transformer.
translation.ja: ルイスは大気変換炉技師だ

translation.en: We should destroy this one and print a new, proper Lewis immediately.
translation.ja: 今すぐにでも 新しいルイスが必要なんだ

translation.en: Look, I agree with Mack. If I were in that state, I wouldn't want to be kept alive.
translation.ja: 俺がルイスなら 早く殺してほしいけどね

translation.en: You're just trying to detract from the fact that it's murder.
translation.ja: 殺人から目をそらさないで

translation.en: That is not a person. It's just a lump of flesh.
translation.ja: あれは人間じゃない ただの肉の塊だよ

translation.en: Patty…
translation.ja: パティ

translation.en: According to the rules set forth by the Planetary Development Agency,
translation.ja: 惑星開発機関が 定めた規則では⸺

translation.en: major decisions require unanimous consent.
translation.ja: 大事な決断には 全員の同意が要る

translation.en: If you aren't in agreement, we can't euthanize him.
translation.ja: あなたの同意が ルイスの救いになる

translation.en: We can put it in the record that you initially objected,
translation.ja: 君は最初 安楽死に反対した

translation.en: so it won't be on your conscience.
translation.ja: 罪悪感を感じることない

translation.en: We respect your principles, Patty, we do.
translation.ja: 君の主張は尊重してるよ

translation.en: And all life should be protected, without exception.
translation.ja: すべての命は平等だ 例外なしに

translation.en: But we're in a special situation.
translation.ja: だが今は非常事態だ

translation.en: That's not it at all.
translation.ja: それだけじゃない

translation.en: I can take care of the procedure.
translation.ja: 生まれたことさえ⸺

translation.en: He'll just go into a deep sleep, without ever knowing he was even born.
translation.ja: 知り得ないまま 深い眠りに落ちるだけよ

translation.en: Okay, if there's no other choice.
translation.ja: 他に方法は なさそうね

translation.en: It just doesn't seem right to let a soul be destroyed.
translation.ja: 魂まで消えるわけじゃない

translation.en: A soul, huh?
translation.ja: 魂だって？

translation.en: Do we even have souls?
translation.ja: 俺たちに？

translation.en: Beats me. Seriously, though, are all botanists like her?
translation.ja: 植物学者は みんな あんな感じか？

translation.en: I think she might be especially compassionate.
translation.ja: 彼女は特別 慈悲深い

translation.en: She says she can even talk to cats and dogs.
translation.ja: 犬や猫とも通じ合うそうだ

translation.en: Well, having a botanist is essential for this mission.
translation.ja: 植物学者は この任務に欠かせない

translation.en: If there aren't plants rooted into the surface of Planet X- 10,
translation.ja: 惑星X-10が 不毛の土地だったら

translation.en: there'll be no stable supply of oxygen.
translation.ja: 酸素が生成できない

translation.en: Yeah, sure, but…  …this isn't normal.
translation.ja: 今は非常事態だ

translation.en: I'm not talking about her. I mean all of us.
translation.ja: 俺たちにも関わってくる

translation.en: We asked her to agree to kill one of our own.
translation.ja: 彼女の同意を得ないと

translation.en: That's not on us.
translation.ja: 罪を問うなら⸺

translation.en: Blame whoever thought of printing human beings in the first place.
translation.ja: 最初に人間の印刷を 思いついた奴へ

translation.en: You know living things can't travel through subspace. This was our only choice.
translation.ja: 我々で判断を 下すしかないのか

translation.en: Hi, Nina. How are you feeling?
translation.ja: ニーナ　調子はどう？

translation.en: Have you seen Planet X- 10 yet?
translation.ja: もう惑星X-10かしら？

translation.en: I am the original version of you.
translation.ja: 私は あなたのオリジナルよ

translation.en: I recorded this right before leaving Earth.
translation.ja: もう少しで地球を発つ

translation.en: I left a present for you. I hope you found it.
translation.ja: あなたに これを 分かるかしら？

translation.en: If you, the printed version of me,
translation.ja: 私と同じ記憶を持ち⸺

translation.en: properly share the same consciousness and memories of the past,
translation.ja: 同じ意識を持つんだもの

translation.en: then you should know what it is.
translation.ja: これが何か分かるはず

translation.en: It's the cat doll from our childhood.
translation.ja: 猫のぬいぐるみよ

translation.en: It's always been by my side, watching over me,
translation.ja: 小さい頃から ずっと一緒に過ごしてる

translation.en: and-- and now I'm giving it to you.
translation.ja: 小さい頃から ずっと一緒に過ごしてる あなたに譲るわ

translation.en: She's thinking of me
translation.ja: 彼女のおかげで

translation.en: so that, as a printed copy, I don't forget that I'm human.
translation.ja: 人間であることを 忘れずにいられる

translation.en: So, I guess I'll see you in a hundred years.
translation.ja: 会えるのは100年後かしら？

translation.en: By that time, a green paradise will have spread out
translation.ja: その時は惑星X-10に⸺

translation.en: over the surface of Planet X- 10.
translation.ja: 緑が生い茂ってるといいな

translation.en: This smell really takes me back to Earth.
translation.ja: この香りは地球を思い出す

translation.en: The wind, the sun…
translation.ja: 風に太陽…

translation.en: …the swing that was in my backyard.
translation.ja: 家の庭にあったブランコ

translation.en: It's going to take three syringes?
translation.ja: ３本も打つのか？

translation.en: The first is a sedative, the next is a muscle relaxant,
translation.ja: 最初に鎮静剤を打ち 次に筋弛緩薬(きんしかんやく)

translation.en: and the last one stops the heart from beating.
translation.ja: 最初に鎮静剤を打ち 次に筋弛緩薬(きんしかんやく) 最後に心臓を停止させる

translation.en: A sedative?
translation.ja: 鎮静剤？

translation.en: It's the most humane process.
translation.ja: 安楽死の手順よ

translation.en: Is Patty there with you?
translation.ja: パティは そこに？

translation.en: No. She's in the Greenhouse.
translation.ja: いや 植物プラントにいる

translation.en: She doesn't wanna see this.
translation.ja: 見たくないのさ

translation.en: Okay, I guess I should get started.
translation.ja: そうね そろそろ始めましょうか

translation.en: Please.
translation.ja: 頼んだよ

translation.en: You shouldn't feel a thing.
translation.ja: 怖いことはないわ

translation.en: You'll just start sleeping a little deeper than you are now.
translation.ja: 今より深い眠りに 落ちるだけよ

translation.en: You're going to be reborn.
translation.ja: そして生まれ変わるの

translation.en: Your being here was a mistake.
translation.ja: 今回は手違いだった

translation.en: Wait.
translation.ja: 待て

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: どうした

translation.en: Never mind. Must be imagining things.
translation.ja: すまない　気のせいだ

translation.en: Good night.
translation.ja: おやすみ

translation.en: Sleep peacefully.
translation.ja: どうか安らかに

translation.en: - Nina! - Damn it!
translation.ja: クソッ！

translation.en: Patty! Patty! C- Can you hear me?
translation.ja: パティ！　聞こえるか？

translation.en: Oscar, what's wrong?
translation.ja: どうしたの？

translation.en: Stay where you are.
translation.ja: そこから動くなよ

translation.en: Why? What's happening?
translation.ja: 何があったの？

translation.en: It's-- It's Lewis. He got up, and--
translation.ja: ルイスが起きて…

translation.en: - - Fire! Fire!
translation.ja: 火事です　火事です

translation.en: All crew members, please evacuate immediately.
translation.ja: 今すぐ避難してください

translation.en: - - Fire! Fire! Fire! Fire!
translation.ja: 火事です　火事です…

translation.en: Oscar, help Nina.
translation.ja: ニーナを頼む

translation.en: Fire! Fire!
translation.ja: 火事です

translation.en: - All crew members, please evacuate… - Can anyone hear me?
translation.ja: 聞こえる？

translation.en: - This is Patty. Please respond. What ha-- -
translation.ja: 誰か応答して　一体何が…

translation.en: Lewis?
translation.ja: ルイス？

translation.en: Patty! Run!
translation.ja: 逃げろ！

translation.en: Nina! Are you all right? Nina.
translation.ja: ニーナ　無事か？

translation.en: Lewis?
translation.ja: ルイス？

translation.en: Lewis!
translation.ja: ルイス！

translation.en: I-- I feel like we should say something.
translation.ja: ニーナに お別れの言葉を

translation.en: You go ahead. I don't have any words.
translation.ja: 俺は かける言葉が 見つからない

translation.en: Goodbye, Nina.
translation.ja: さようなら

translation.en: I-- I'm sorry.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい

translation.en: Now it's more like The Tomb than The Womb.
translation.ja: ウームは まるで お墓みたい

translation.en: Those words are more connected than you might think.
translation.ja: 理にかなっている

translation.en: They say, long ago, that people built graves and temples as wombs for the dead to be reborn in.
translation.ja: 墓や寺院は 死者が 生まれ変わる場所とされてる

translation.en: Don't tell me you're gonna use that for self- defense.
translation.ja: まさか護身用じゃないよな？

translation.en: No, for hunting.
translation.ja: ああ 奴を狩る

translation.en: You know the printer won't let us make weapons. This is as good as it gets.
translation.ja: ウームでは 武器を作れないからな

translation.en: It's too dangerous to leave out there.
translation.ja: 手ぶらじゃ危険だ

translation.en: The reprint is starting. We'll see Nina in half an hour.
translation.ja: 30分後 ニーナが印刷される

translation.en: Vision, normal.
translation.ja: 視覚　正常

translation.en: Hearing, normal.
translation.ja: 聴覚　正常

translation.en: Smell…
translation.ja: 嗅覚…

translation.en: …normal.
translation.ja: 正常

translation.en: Pain perception, normal.
translation.ja: 痛覚　正常

translation.en: Memories, clear.
translation.ja: 記憶　正常

translation.en: I am human.
translation.ja: 私は人間だ
